spells.name: Air Walk, Communal
spells.description: As air walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Dust Form
spells.description: You become an incorporeal creature of dust for a short period of time.

spells.name: Languid Bomb Admixture
spells.description: Empowers bombs you throw to cause fatigue in those directly hit or splashed by the bomb.

spells.name: Stoneskin, Communal
spells.description: As stoneskin, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
